mapper.select: select b.*, m.* from (select a.*, rowNum rn from (select * from cs order by cs_ref desc, cs_re_step)a)b, member m where b.m_num=m.m_num and rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
mapper.update: update cs set cs_view = cs_view + 1 where cs_num=#{cs_num}
update cs set del = 'y' where cs_ref = #{cs_ref}
update cs set con = 'y' where cs_ref = #{cs_ref} and cs_re_step=0
mapper.select: select * from cs where cs_ref=#{cs_ref} and cs_re_step=0
mapper.insert: insert into alert (ale_num, cs_num, cs_title, m_num) values ((SELECT NVL(MAX(ale_num),0)+1 FROM alert), #{cs_num},#{cs_title},#{m_num})
mapper.select: select ale_num, m_num, sch_num, sch_name, s_date-sysdate+1 as day, temp_num, temp_name, temp_crud, place_num, del, cs_num, cs_title, t_num, t_title from alert where m_num=#{m_num}
